name: Balls Of Heroes
description:
In Balls Of Heroes, Evil Overlords intend to destroy the world (Again), and you must stop them...By dating a bunch of super heroes. Will you use the power of love, or will your lack of social skills destory us all?.

Disclaimer:

This game was made for educational purposes, so many of things in the current version are not fully completed and will have some copyrighted images used for such purposes under the Fair Use Act. Updates will come out as much as possible to have a full experience.
